author: B Kolappan
text:
Twenty more keerthanas of Wallajapet Venkatramana Bhagavathar, one of the prime disciples of Saint Thyagaraja, have been discovered. They will be incorporated in the next edition of a book containing his keerthanas . The book will be published on March 2, on the 235th birth anniversary of Venkataramana Bhagavathar at Ayyampettai near Thanjavur.

“The 20 keerthanas are in addition to the 70 keerthanas already published as a book by me,” said T.R. Damodharan, former curator of the Saraswati Mahal Library in Thanjavur.
title: 20 more ‘keerthanas’ of Thyagaraja’s disciple found
